channel.title: Do i have to comp[ile my server?
channel.description: do i have to compile my server? to make a command... because I dont know where and how to get javac.exe?

item.title: Do i have to comp[ile my server?
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

What? How do i update my Class files?

Read full topic
item.source: Do i have to comp[ile my server?

item.title: Do i have to comp[ile my server?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end pause exit
save that as compile.bat
when you add the command, you gotta compile to update your class files
if you dont the update you made wont take effect

Read full topic
